meanings.definition: The process of decay or rotting in a body or other organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The putrefaction of the fruit attracted flies to the compost pile.
meanings.sent2: The smell of putrefaction coming from the abandoned house was unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the putrefaction of the old vegetables in the fridge could be mistaken for a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The putrefaction of corruption in the government was slowly eroding public trust.
meanings.sent5: The putrefaction of the fallen leaves created a rich, earthy scent in the forest.
